Package bg.x2d.gen

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Generator<T>
    Represents an object that can generate another type of object usually in a pseudo-random or configurable manner.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorGenerator
    Generates random colors using a custom configuration of constant and randomized color channels.
    NumberGenerator<T extends Number>
    Generates a random number between the specified bounds using the parameterized number type.
    PointGenerator
    Generates a random point using the given x and y bounds.
    PolyGenerator
    Generates a random polygon with n sides and inside of the specified Rectangle.
